items.summary:

One of the more notable deals of the lot gets you the brand’s 2025 Idea Tab Plus Android tablet for $199.99 shipped. This particular model hit the scene earlier this year carrying a $290 price tag, and this unit here without the included Lenovo Pen typically goes for $270. Today’s deal at Best Buy takes $70 off its usual going rate, to mark the lowest price we have tracked for it. Alternatively, you can score the variant with an included stylus for $219.99 shipped from Lenovo. A handful of other Lenovo Android tablets are also discounted right now at both Best Buy and directly at Lenovo, and you can learn more about it in detail below.
